slides.content:
The current owner has inherited an extraordinary apartment in the heart of Lodi. He envisions an entrance that welcomes guests with a bold mix of his historical elements and innovative touches.

 For us, in this project, innovation and preservation merge in a dynam - ic and stimulating dialogue, respecting the history of this 19th-century building. Overall, the client seeks the perfect combination of Florence’s cultural heritage and 21st-century comforts, creating a distinctive and inviting environment for his guests.
